title: I can't log in to reconnect to the game
body: http://gyazo.com/aeae67aec871f34d3389b205353216f7 i get that... before i kept trying to reconnect & it was giving me the bs about firewall not letting me through disabled firewall and alll the rest. still cant connect have dns set to 8.8.8.8  & 8.8.4.4 as well

replies.body: update, i can log in now after resetting my router but i got a leave for the game because of it.. is there anyway to expunge that from my record i never leave games or if i have, i havent done it in over a year

>is there anyway to expunge that from my record

Quick answer, no.

Long answer, Riot have recently implement technologies to detect when you're booted by your ISPs, but it isn't yet sophisticated enough to detect individuals yet, so on record it shows that you've just upped and left the game. It's very unlikely that the marker is going to be removed, but, you can still attempt. To do so, send in a support ticket to Riot explaining your situation.

Best of luck.
